title: Broward County sees 'great turnout' on first day back to school
text:
Broward County sees 'great turnout' on first day back to school 4:17pm EST - 02:03 
Broward County Superintendent Robert Runcie said there was an attendance rate of 95 percent on the first day back to school since the school shooting on Feb. 14 that left 17 people dead in Parkland, Florida. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Broward County Superintendent Robert Runcie said there was an attendance rate of 95 percent on the first day back to school since the school shooting on Feb. 14 that left 17 people dead in Parkland, Florida.
